nodes.text: A wooden lodge on Tharl was borrowed by Auric Graf between his family's expeditions. The lodge had set of creaking stairs leading down to a dark and dusty basement where a variety of creatures and bugs lived. Auric Graf's son, Milo Graf, loved the lodge, except for its basement, which frightened him so much that he wasn't able to go down there, although he regularly stood at the top of the stairs and tried.
